113
October 7th 3
Richard J Brown
Springfield Ky
Dear Sir
Yours of the 5th inst. recommending John S Corzine of Co E and Matthew Newman of Co F 10th Ky Inf. for promotion, has been referred by the Governor to this Department.
The invariable rule of this office is, to make appointments & promotions upon the recommendation of the Commandant of the Regiment

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Gen Ky

By J. T. Bramlette
Asst. Adjt. Gen.
